get.description: Returns a list of backtests/evaluations with only the id and name

schema.title: Response Get Backtests Crud Backtests Get
Response Get Predictions Crud Predictions Get
Response Get Datasets Crud Datasets Get

get.description: Lists all model templates from the db.

schema.title: Response List Model Templates Crud Model Templates Get

post.description:
Add a model template from a whitelisted GitHub URL.
The url+version must be in the approved whitelist.

get.description:
Lists whitelisted model templates that can be added.
Fetches from remote whitelist URLs configured in config/approved_model_repos.yaml.

schema.title: Response List Available Model Templates Crud Model Templates Available Get

delete.description:
Delete a model template by ID.
This will cascade delete all configured models using this template.

get.description: List all configured models from the db

schema.title: Response List Configured Models Crud Configured Models Get

post.description: Add a configured model to the database

delete.description: Soft delete a configured model by setting archived to True

get.description: List all models from the db (alias for configured models)

schema.title: Response List Models Crud Models Get

post.description: Add a model to the database (alias for configured models)

This endpoint creates a dataset from the provided data and the data to be fetched3
and puts it in the database

get.description: Return a list of backtests that are compatible for comparison with the given backtest

schema.title: Response Get Compatible Backtests Analytics Compatible Backtests  Backtestid  Get

get.description: Return the org units and split periods that are common between two backtests
return

schema.title: Response Get Prediction Entry Analytics Prediction Entry Get

get.description:
Return quantiles for the forecasts in a backtest. Can optionally be filtered on split period and org units.
NOTE: If org_units is set to ["adm0"], the sum over all regions is returned.

schema.title: Response Get Evaluation Entries Analytics Evaluation Entry Get
Response Get Prediction Entries Analytics Prediction Entry  Predictionid  Get

get.description:
Return the actual disease cases corresponding to a backtest. Can optionally be filtered on org units.

Note: If org_units is set to ["adm0"], the sum over all regions is returned.

schema.title: Response Get Data Sources Analytics Data Sources Get

parameters.name: dryRun

schema.description: If True, only run validation and do not create a backtest
schema.title: Dryrun

parameters.description: If True, only run validation and do not create a backtest

get.description: Trigger a Celery task to add two numbers.
Get the status and result of a task.

schema.title: Response Get Status Debug Get Status Get

get.description:
List all jobs currently in the queue.
Optionally filters by a list of job IDs, a list of statuses, and/or a job type.
Filtering order: IDs, then type, then status.

schema.title: Response Get Job Status Jobs  Job Id  Get
Response Delete Job Jobs  Job Id  Delete
Response Cancel Job Jobs  Job Id  Cancel Post
Response Get Logs Jobs  Job Id  Logs Get
